yoast_head_json.title: Rappel into the Gauntlet
yoast_head_json.description: Start your day with a boost of extra adventure. No need for coffee, we'll get your adrenaline flowing with a rappel into the Granite Gorge, where you'll meet your raft for The Gauntlet Pine Creek & The Numbers rafting trips.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Start your day with a boost of extra adventure. No need for coffee, we'll get your adrenaline flowing with a rappel into the Granite Gorge, where you'll meet your raft for The Gauntlet Pine Creek & The Numbers rafting trips.

@graph.name: Rappel into the Gauntlet
@graph.description: Start your day with a boost of extra adventure. No need for coffee, we'll get your adrenaline flowing with a rappel into the Granite Gorge, where you'll meet your raft for The Gauntlet Pine Creek & The Numbers rafting trips.

@graph.caption: group paddling straight into oncoming spray
